name: kancio-development-website
description: Kancio Development - Digital Solutions & AI Integration Services
author: Kancio Development

scripts.build: vite build && npm run copy-static && npm run verify-ads
scripts.copy-static: cp -f privacy-policy.html dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No static HTML files to copy'
scripts.verify-ads: echo 'Verifying ads.txt files...' && ls -la dist/ads.txt dist/app-ads.txt || echo 'Warning: ads.txt files not found in dist!'
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs assets/js/vendor/jquery/jquery-3.6.0.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.fitvids.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.greedy-navigation.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.magnific-popup.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.ba-throttle-debounce.js assets/js/plugins/smooth-scroll.js assets/js/plugins/gumshoe.js assets/js/_main.js -c -m -o assets/js/main.min.js
scripts.build:js: npm run uglify && npm run add-banner
